loginUrl:
<js>
//请不要改书源的任何地方，请点击“登录”后再填写

function getToast(){
	java.toast("用来看的，别点了，确认请点右上角的✓")
	};
	
function login(){
	Map = source.getLoginInfoMap();
	Map == (Map == null||Map=="")?{}:Map
	let token = Map.get("登录请在这里填写app的token");
	token = (token==""||token==null)?"":token;
	java.log(token);
	
	let fl = Map.get("填写需要开启的分类序号（如2,4,5【默认为9,10】）");
	fl = (fl==""||fl==null)?"9,10":fl;
	java.log(fl);
	
	let bq = Map.get("填写需要开启的分类序号（如2【默认为5，只能单选】）");
	bq = (bq==""||bq==null)?"5":bq;
	 
	 option = {
	 	"token":String(token),
	 	"fl":String(fl),
	 	"bq":String(bq)
	 	}
	source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(option))
	
	}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
function decode(){ let v43,v38,dest; let respose = java.get(baseUrl,{"User-Agent": "Dalvik/2.1.0"}); let accesskey = String(respose.header("accesskey")); let keyString = String(respose.header("keystring")); let content = String(respose.body()); let accesskeyLen = accesskey.length; let v9 =0; let v6 = String(accesskey[accesskeyLen-1]).charCodeAt(); for(i=0;i v18){ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,(v18-v16)+v15) }else{ v43 = keyString.substring(v15,v17+v15) } let v32 = content.length; if((v6 & 1)!=0){ v38 = content.substring(v32-12,v32) dest = content.substring(0,v32-12) }else{ v38 = content.substring(0,12); dest = content.substring(12,content.length); } let key = java.md5Encode(v43+v38).substring(0,8); let iv = java.md5Encode(v38).substring(0,8); content = java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String(key), String(iv)).decryptStr(dest); return content } if(/jjwxc/.test(baseUrl)){ intro=String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g,''); /"content"/.test(result)?java.setContent(result):java.setContent(decode()); intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n【📢作者有话说】\n"+saybody:""; if(/token/.test(baseUrl)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{ result=intro+content+say } }else{ result="" } //评论开启 let bbb = book.getVariable("custom") let sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)){ body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;title=$.chaptername;title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');intro=$.chapterintro;vip=$.isvip!='0';lock=$.islock!='0';type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

bbb = book.getVariable("custom");sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}
if(/章节名/.test(bbb) || /章节名/.test(sss)){
num=!type?"第"+$.chapterid+"章 ":'';
}
title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	fu = /目录简介【(.*?)】/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]:sss.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]
	title = title +fu+intro
	}else{
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现 符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

function parse(data){
	let args=data.split(separator);
	let title = args[0],url=args[1],num=nums;
	if(args[2]!=undefined){num=args[2]}
	//链接生成
	 let u=/^\d+/.test(url)?"http://app-cdn.jjwxc.net/bookstore/getFullPage?channelBody=%7B%"+url+"%22%3A%7B%22offset%22%3A%22{{(page-1)*25}}%22%2C%22limit%22%3A%2225%22%7D%7D&versionCode=148":url;
	 
 //try {num = args[2] }catch(e){}
 try {tag = args[3];
 u=tag=="bq"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq='+url+'&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx=0&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{String(source.getLoginHeader())}\}':u;
 u=tag=="lx"?'https://android.jjwxc.com/search/getSearchForKeyWords?versionCode=313&offset={{(page-1)*20}}&limit=20&bq=0&removetags=0&fw=0&yc=0&xx=3&sd=0&lx='+url+'&fg=0&mainview=0&fbsj=0&collectionTypes=ors&isfinish=0&sortType=0&token={\{String(source.getLoginHeader())}}':u
 }catch(e){}
	return [title, u, num]
	}

function FlexBox(title, url, num){
		 let obj={};
		 obj.style={},obj.title=title,obj.url=url?url:'',obj.style['layout_flexGrow']=1;
	//数值设定
	let data={1:1,2:0.4,3:0.25,4:0.2,5:0.15,7:0.1,10:0.05};
obj.style['layout_flexBasisPercent']=data[num]
		return obj
		}
result=JSON.stringify(all.map(data=>{
	let args=parse(data);
	return FlexBox.apply(null, args)
	}))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
if(baseUrl.match(/jjwxc/)){ intro=String(java.get("intro1")).replace(/\s/g,''); if(/token/.test(baseUrl)){ url = "https://android.jjwxc.net/androidapi/androidChapterBatchDownload,"; body = "versionCode=313&novelId="+baseUrl.match(/novelId=(\d+)/)[1]+"&chapterIds="+baseUrl.match(/chapterId=(\d+)/)[1]+"&token="+String(source.getLoginHeader()) option = { "method":"POST", "body":String(body) } url = url+JSON.stringify(option); html = java.ajax(url) java.setContent(html) } intro=intro!=""?"◎"+intro+"◎
":""; content=java.getString("$..content"); saybody=java.getString("$..sayBody"); say=saybody!=""?"\n【📢作者有话说】\n"+saybody:""; if(baseUrl.match(/token/)){ vipc=String(content).length > 30?java.createSymmetricCrypto("DES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", String("KW8Dvm2N"), String("1ae2c94b")).decryptStr(content):java.getString("$..message")+"\n登录后请更新目录，刷新正文"; result=intro+String(vipc+say); }else{result=intro+content+say} }else{result="ㅤ"} //评论开启 bbb = book.getVariable("custom") sss=source.getVariable() if(/评论/.test(bbb) || /评论/.test(sss)){ let commentNum =/评论/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]:sss.match(/评论(\d+)/)[1]; if(/chapterContent/.test(baseUrl)){ commentUrl = baseUrl.replace(/androidapi/,'comment').replace(/chapterContent/,'getCommentList')+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0"; }else if(/androidChapterBatchDownload/.test(baseUrl)) { body = baseUrl.match(/body":"(.*?)"/)[1]; commentUrl = "https://app.jjwxc.org/comment/getCommentList?"+body+"&limit="+commentNum+"&offset=0&commentSort=0" } comment = JSON.parse(java.ajax(commentUrl)); cflag = comment.code == "200" ? true:false; ccflag = comment.code == undefined ? true:false commentList = []; if(cflag || ccflag){ commentList =comment.commentList || comment.data.commentList ||[]; commentb = ""; }else{ commentb = comment.message } for(i=0;i ##为营造更好的评论环境，近期网站要求发评须进行实名认证，未实名用户评论暂时仅在对应作者后台及发评用户后台可见.*|获取正文失败[\s\S]+|◎\s+?◎

ruleExplore.author: $.authorName||$.authorname
ruleExplore.name: $.novelName||$.novelname||$.message

ruleSearch.author: author
ruleSearch.name: title

ruleToc.chapterName:
<js>
$=result;title=$.chaptername;title=String(title).replace(/^\s+/,'');intro=$.chapterintro;vip=$.isvip!='0';lock=$.islock!='0';type=$.chaptertype=='1'?true:false;num=!type?$.chapterid+"  ☪ ":'';

bbb = book.getVariable("custom");sss = source.getVariable();
if(/去章节序号/.test(bbb) || /去章节序号/.test(sss)){
num=''
}
if(/章节名/.test(bbb) || /章节名/.test(sss)){
num=!type?"第"+$.chapterid+"章 ":'';
}
title=type?'📖 '+title+' 📖':title;
if( (/目录简介/.test(bbb) || /目录简介/.test(sss))&&!/📖/.test(title)){
	fu = /目录简介【(.*?)】/.test(bbb)?bbb.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]:sss.match(/目录简介【(.*?)】/)[1]
	title = title +fu+intro
	}else{
		java.put("intro1",intro);
		}
l=lock?'[此章节已锁]':'';
result=num+title+l;
</js>

variableComment:
1、书籍变量（当前书）
填写 [去章节序号] —— 去除章节序号
填写[章节名]  ——  变为第xx章 章节名

填写 [目录简介【符号】] —— 章节简介放到目录列表，正文不出现 符号：跟章节名连接时中间的符号，如 目录简介【 】，中间将为空格

填写 [评论+评论数量]——如 评论50  则可以显示50条评论，数量必填

填写 [开启购买/关闭购买]  —— 如 开启购买 则会开启自动购买下五章【确认以后点右上角三点刷新才会生效，使用完毕后最好删除，避免重复请求】

2、源变量（所有书）
同书籍变量

bookSourceComment:
发现为空，目录加载失败，点击登录验证一下。
想看订阅章节，点登录，在我的书架那里登录。

loginUrl:
<js>
function login(){
userInfo=source.getLoginInfoMap()
java.log(userInfo)
UNE=userInfo['手机号码/邮箱号']
PWD=userInfo['密码']
url="https://afdian.net/api/passport/login,";
SU=source.getKey()
body={
  "account": String(UNE),
  "password": String(PWD),
  "mp_token": -1
}
option={
'method': 'POST',
'body': JSON.stringify(body)
}

url=url+JSON.stringify(option)
token=java.ajax(url).match(/"auth_token":"([^"]+)"/)[1]

Cookie={
	"Cookie":"auth_token="+token
	}
header = JSON.stringify(Cookie)
source.putLoginHeader(header)
}
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
let replaceCover = (u) => {
    if (u.startsWith("https://")) u = u.substring(8)
    else u = u.substring(7)
    let uArr = u.split("/")
    uArr[0] = "https://p6-novel.byteimg.com/origin"
    let uArr2 = []
    uArr.forEach((x) => {
        if (!x.includes("?") && !x.includes("~")) uArr2.push(x)
        else uArr2.push(x.split("~")[0])
    })
    u = uArr2.join("/")
    return u
}
replaceCover(java.getString("thumb_url"))
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
//AES解密
function De(data, key, iv) {
	aes = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
	return aes.decrypt(data)
}
//AES加密
function En(data, key, iv) {
	aes = java.createSymmetricCrypto("AES/CBC/PKCS5Padding", key, iv)
	return aes.encrypt(data)
}
function rHex(num) {
	hex = Number(num).toString(16).padStart(32, "0")
	res = ""
	for (i = hex.length; i > 0; i -= 2) {
		res += hex.substring(i - 2, i)
	}
	return res
}
//获取key
function getKey() {
	key = b64De("rCXGfd2POMGzeiNIgo4iLg==")
	id = java.strToBytes(java.randomUUID().slice(0,16))
	did = baseUrl.match(/device_id=(\d+)/)[1]
	data = java.hexDecodeToByteArray(rHex(did))
	content = b64En(id.concat(En(data, key, id)))
	data = JSON.stringify({
		"content": content
	})
	url = xGorgon("https://reading.snssdk.com/reading/crypt/registerkey?"+source.getLoginHeader(), gzip(data))
	uri = String(url).split(",{")
	url = uri[0]
	option = JSON.parse("{"+uri[1])
	obj = post(url, b64De(option.body), option.headers).data
	res = b64De(obj.key)
	iv = res.slice(0, 16)
	data = res.slice(16)
	key = b64En(De(data, key, iv))
	java.log(key)
	obj = {
		"key": key,
		"ver": obj.keyver
	}
	source.setVariable(JSON.stringify(obj, "", "\t"))
}
//正文
result = JSON.parse(result).data
baseUrl = String(xGorgon(baseUrl))
//java.log(baseUrl)
if (result.content == "Invalid") {
	getKey()
	result = JSON.parse(java.ajax(baseUrl)).data
}
// java.log(JSON.stringify(result, "", "  "))
ver = result.key_version
v = source.getVariable()
if (v == "" || ver != JSON.parse(v).ver) getKey()
key = JSON.parse(source.getVariable()).key
res = b64De(result.content)
key = b64De(key)
iv = res.slice(0, 16)
java.bytesToStr(De(res.slice(16), key, iv))
</js>

ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
if(result.match(/請勿瀏覽及購買本館商品，本網站已依照台灣網站內容分級規定處理。/)){
url="https://www.popo.tw{{@@id.books-form@action}}";

value=result.match(/name="_poporf-tk001" value="([^"]+)">/)[1];

Cookie=String(cookie.getCookie(baseUrl));
body='cid=&type=&_poporf-tk001='+value;

cookies=java.post(url,body,{"cookie":Cookie}).cookies();

Cookies=String(cookies).match(/\{(.*?)\}/)[1]+'; '+Cookie;

header={"Cookie":String(Cookies)}
headers={"headers":JSON.stringify(header)}
java.put('header',JSON.stringify(headers));
Url=baseUrl+','+JSON.stringify(headers);

result=String(java.ajax(Url))

}else{result=result}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

<js>
paperid=baseUrl.match(/paperid=(\d+)/)[1];
code=result.match(/vercodechk.*?'[^']+'/)?result.match(/vercodechk.*?'([^']+)'/)[1]:'';
url=book.origin+'/showpapercolor.php,';
body='paperid='+paperid+'&vercodechk='+code;
option={
"method":"POST",
"body":String(body)
}
result=java.ajax(url+JSON.stringify(option));

eggs=java.getString('@@class.uk-placeholder.-1@html');
if(!eggs.match(/【作家想說的話：】|加載中.../) && eggs!=""){
eggs="【彩蛋内容：】"+eggs
}else{eggs=''}
write=java.getString('@@id.colorpanelwritersay@html');
result=result+write+eggs;
if(!String(result).match(/[\u4e00-\u9fa5]/) && !(String(result).match(/login\.php/))){
result="此章节需要购买\n💰"+java.getString('@@class.uk-card.0@class.uk-list.0@tag.li.10@text&&class.uk-alert-danger@html')
}else{result=result}
String(result).match(/login.php/)?'请登录后刷新正文阅读':result
</js>

ruleSearch.bookList:
<js>
function loading(){
var su=source.getKey(),
sk=java.get("sk"),
q="?q="+java.encodeURI(sk);

var c="Hm_lvt_="+~~(Date.now()/1e3);
var head={
	accept: "application/json",
	"accept-language": "zh-CN,en-US;q=0.9",
	referer: baseUrl,
	cookie: String(c)
};

var hm=";hm="+java.head(su+"/user/hm.html"+q,head).cookies().hm;
head.cookie = String(head.cookie+hm);

var get=java.get(su+"/user/search.html"+q, head).body();

var j=JSON.parse(get),
m=j.map(_=>JSON.stringify(_));

var b=[],
v=source.getVariable();
//条件判断，存在不为空和0，且小于长度
if(v&&v!=""&&v!=0&&v<m.length){
	for(i=0;i<=v-1;i++){
		b.push(m[i])
		}
	m=b;
	}else{m=m}
//返回列表
return m
}
//当前url包含json为发现，直接返回结果
m=/json/.test(baseUrl)?result:loading();
//不包含json为搜索，进行搜索加载
m
</js>
$.*

<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
/*
                    书源使用说明
              
一、登入使用说明
 ㈠ 搜索需要登入方可使用。
 ㈡ 注册所需“手机号”可自编，正常手机号11位即可，无须真实手机号。
 ㈢ 注册需要填写昵称、手机号和密码，登入只需要手机号和密码。
 ㈣ 添加书籍至书架需要填写书籍ID，然后点击添加；移除书籍需填写书架ID，然后点击移除。相应ID在书籍详情查看。
 
二、换源使用说明
     可根据序号设置书籍变量来切换来源(默认0)，具体请看书籍详情。
     
三、制作
       部分代码借鉴了 landseer 的换源APP。
       仅供学习研究使用，请在24h内删除。
              
四、测试
       提供一个测试账号<手机号：13112341234><密码：zxcvbnm>
       
五、注意
       若发现加载失败，刷新几次即可。


分类显示，没写
status=0/1/2 全部/连载/完结   
sort=[
["最多阅读","allvisit"],
["最近更新","book_uptime"],
["最多收藏","allcollect"],
["最高评分","book_score"],
["最多搜索","book_search_num"],
["最多评论","allcomment"]];
*/

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
chapterPageBeat = java.get("chapterPageBeat");
chapterUrl = java.get("chapterUrl");
chapterName = java.get("chapterName");

sourceUrl1 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1];
java.log(sourceUrl1);
sourceUrl2 = baseUrl.match(/(http[s]?:\/\/[\.a-zA-Z0-9_-]+\/[\/a-zA-Z0-9_-]+)(\/)/)[1]
java.log(sourceUrl2);

if(chapterPageBeat!=""){
f=new RegExp(chapterPageBeat,"i");
cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").match(f)[1];
}
else{cont=String(result).replace(/\s+/g, " ").replace(/>\s+</g, "><");}

var chapterList = [];
name = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterName,"g"));
url = cont.match(new RegExp(chapterUrl,"g"));

for(var i = 0; i < name.length; i ++){
text = name[i].match(chapterName)[1];
uri = url[i].match(chapterUrl)[1];

if(uri.indexOf("/") == -1){
	 	href=sourceUrl2 +"/"+ uri;
	 	}else{href = sourceUrl1 + uri;}
	 	href = href +","+ JSON.stringify({"headers":{"Referer":href}})
	 	
chapterList.push({
		 	  text: text,
		  	 href: href	
      	})            
 }

chapterList
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  flag=source.getVariable()=="1"?true:false
  let $ = JSON.parse(String(result))
  let array = []
  $.data.vs.forEach((booklet) => {
    array.push({ 
    	    name:String(booklet.vN),
    	    voltype:true
    	 })
    booklet.cs.forEach((chapter) => {
    	  vip = chapter.sS!="1"?"🔒":""
    	  href = `https://vipreader.qidian.com/chapter/`+baseUrl.match(/bookId=(\d+)/)[1]+`/`+chapter.id+`/`;
    	  href=flag?href+",{'webView': true}":href
      array.push({
        name: String(vip+chapter.cN),
        url: href,
        time:"更新时间:"+String(chapter.uT)+"  字数:"+String(chapter.cnt),
        voltype:false
      })
    })
  })
  array
</js>

((result.match(/ \/ (\d+) 页/))!=null){

var list=[];

if(/page/.test(baseUrl)){
	list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl.replace(/page(?:%3D|=)\d+/g,'&page='+i)});
	}else{
		list.push({k:'第'+i+'页',v:baseUrl+'&page='+i});
		}
}
}else{
var list=[{k:'第1页',v:baseUrl}];
}
list
</js>

header:
<js>
let TOKEN = 'token://com.coolapk.market/c67ef5943784d09750dcfbb31020f0ab?'
let PACKAGE_NAME = 'com.coolapk.market';
let DEVICE_ID = String(java.randomUUID());
let APP_DEVICE = (length => {
  let chars = '0123456789abcdefghijklmnopqrstuvwxyzABCDEFGHIJKLMNOPQRSTUVWXYZ'
  let result = ''
  for (var i = length; i > 0; --i) {
    result += chars[Math.floor(Math.random() * chars.length)]
  }
  return result
})(50);

  let t = parseInt(Date.now() / 1000)
  let hex_t = `0x${t.toString(16)}`
  let md5_t = java.digestHex(t.toString(), "md5")
  let a = `${TOKEN}${md5_t}$${DEVICE_ID}&${PACKAGE_NAME}`;
  let md5_a = java.digestHex(String(java.base64Encode(a)),"md5")
  let token = `${md5_a}${DEVICE_ID}${hex_t}`

head = {
      'User-Agent': 'Dalvik/2.1.0 (Linux; U; Android 10; Pixel 4 XL Build/QQ2A.200405.005) +CookMarket/10.1.2-2004302',
      'X-Requested-With': 'XMLHttpRequest',
      'X-Sdk-Int': '29',
      'X-Sdk-Locale': 'zh-CN',
      'X-App-Id': 'com.coolapk.market',
      'X-App-Version': '10.1.2',
      'X-App-Code': '2004302',
      'X-App-Token': token,
      'X-Api-Version': '10',
      'X-App-Device': APP_DEVICE,
      'X-Dark-Mode': '0'
    }
JSON.stringify(head)
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
if(!/apk\/detail/.test(baseUrl)){
    let id = "{{$.data.id}}";
    let html = ""
    let item = JSON.parse(result).data;
    let curPage = 1;
    let lastItem = "";
    let resp2 = JSON.parse(java.ajax("https://api.coolapk.com/v6/feed/replyList?id={{$.data.id}}&page=1&lastItem="));
    let replynum5 = item.replynum;
    replynum5 > 100?replynum5=100:replynum5
    html += createReply(item)
    let item_reply = []
    let totalnum = 0
    let item2 = resp2.data
    item_reply = item_reply.concat(item2)
    while (item2.length && (totalnum = totalnum + item2.length) < replynum5) {
      curPage = curPage + 1
      lastItem = item2[item2.length - 1].id
      resp2 = JSON.parse(java.ajax(`https://api.coolapk.com/v6/feed/replyList?id=${id}&page=${curPage}&lastItem=${lastItem}`))
      item2 = resp2.data
      item_reply = item_reply.concat(item2)
    }

    let grouped_item_reply = {}
    item_reply.map(item => {
      if (item.rrid) {
        grouped_item_reply[item.rrid] = grouped_item_reply[item.rrid] || []
        grouped_item_reply[item.rrid].push(item)
      } else {
        grouped_item_reply[item.id] = grouped_item_reply[item.id] || []
        grouped_item_reply[item.id].push(item)
      }
    })
    for (key in grouped_item_reply) {
      grouped_item_reply[key].sort((e1, e2) => {
        return e1.dateline - e2.dateline
      }).map(item => html += createReply(item, !!item.rrid))
    }
    result = String(html).replace(/<a .*?href="([^"]+)".*?>([^<]+)<\/a>/g,'▪$2：$1▪')
   }else{
   	let html = "软件地址：\nhttps://www.coolapk.com/apk/{{$.data.apkname}}\n";
   	 html +="---复制下面文字到发现规则可看评论---\n"
   	html += "{{$.data.title}}▪回复::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id={{$.data.id}}&sort=&title=最近回复&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"

html += "{{$.data.title}}▪发布::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id=256030&sort=dateline_desc&title=最近发布&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"

html += "{{$.data.title}}▪热度::https://api.coolapk.com/v6/page/dataList?url=#/feed/apkCommentList?id={{$.data.id}}&sort=popular&title=热度排序&page={\{page}}&lastItem=\n"
   	}
</js>

loginUrl:
<js>
var 电话号码=source.getLoginInfoMap().get("电话号码")||result.get("电话号码")

var 验证码=source.getLoginInfoMap().get( "验证码")

var time = Math.round(new Date()/1000);
lll=[
"appId=",
"osType=2",
"product=1",
"sysVer=10",
"time="+time,
"token=",
"ver=2.1.7",
"packageName=com.lestory.jihua.an",
"lang-app=zh-Hans",
"lang=zh-hans",
"locale=CN"
]
function toJson(list){
    json = "";
    for (i in list)
    {
        all = list[i].match(/(.*?)=(.*)/);
        key = all[1];
        value = all[2];
        json += '"' + key + '":' + '"' + value + '",'
    }
    json = '{' + String(json).replace(/,$/,'')+ '}'
    return json;
}

function sign(list){
var sb='';
sb+="Fb0gqLMSf5Android";
list=list.sort();
i=0;
while(i<list.length){
if(i==0){
sb+=list[i]
}else{
    if(list[i].match(/lang-app=/)){  
      i2=i+1;
     i3=i2+1;
     if (list[i2] != null && list[i2].match(/lang=/)) {
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i2];
                        
                        sb+="&";
                        sb+=list[i];
                        
                        i = i3;
                    }
           }
                sb+="&";
                sb+=list[i];             
      }
i++
}
sb+="AEdDtho2CjiH901aVK7swFqclu6NmzJ4";
return String(java.md5Encode(sb)).toUpperCase()
}

num=电话号码;
function getVerificationCode(){
	//获取验证码
 list2=lll;
list2.push( "mobile=86"+num);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2);
option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}
url='http://api.lestory.cn/message/send,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
java.toast(JSON.parse(java.ajax(url)).msg=="success"?"验证码发送成功，请注意短信":"验证码获取失败，请稍候再试");

	}


function login(){
	//登录
	
	y=验证码
	list2=lll;
list2.push("mobile=86"+num);
list2.push("code="+y);
s=sign(list2);
list2.push("sign="+s);
json2=toJson(list2)

option1={
"method": "POST",
"body": String(json2)
}

url='http://api.lestory.cn/user/mobile-login,'+JSON.stringify(option1);
a=JSON.parse(java.ajax(url));
source.putLoginHeader(a.data.user_token=="undefined"?"":a.data.user_token)

java.toast(a.msg=="success"?'获取token成功':JSON.stringify(a));

}

</js>

 }

}`

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请换源或稍后访问~"}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者内容正在手打中，请稍后访问~"}
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>
 loadDocType="{{@@body@data-doctype}}";
 loadType="{{@@body@data-randomtype}}";
sid=baseUrl.match(/(\d+).html/)[1];
url=baseUrl.replace(/\d+.html/,'')

var section = {
    loadDocType: loadDocType,
    loadType: loadType,
    sid:sid,
    content: {
        childNode: [],
        
        init: function(c){
            this.body=c
            if (section.loadType == 'normal') {
      this.load(String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('//*[@name="client"]/@content'))))
            } else if (section.loadType == 'substep') {
                var d = 'r' + section.sid;
                var f = false;
                if (section.loadDocType == 'xml') {
                    d += '.xml'
                } else if (section.loadDocType == 'json') {
                    d += '.json';
                    f = true
                } else {
                    return false
                };        
             cookie="PHPSESSID="+java.get(baseUrl,{}).cookie("PHPSESSID");
            token= java.get(url+d,{"X-Requested-With": "XMLHttpRequest","referer":baseUrl,"cookie":String(cookie)}).header("token")                
                	this.load(token)      	
            } else {
                return false
            };               
        },
        load: function(a) {         
            a = String(java.base64Decode(a)).split(/[A-Z]+%/);      
            var b = 0,
            start = 0;
            for (var i = 0; i < this.body.length; i++) {
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/h2/i)) {
                    start = i + 1
                };
                if (String(this.body[i]).match(/div/i)&& this.body[i].attr("class") != 'chapter') {
                    break
                }
            };
          
            for (var i = 0; i < a.length; i++) {
                if (a[i] < 5) {
                    this.childNode[a[i]] = this.body[i + start];
                      b++
                } else {
                    this.childNode[a[i] - b] = this.body[i + start]                 
                }
            };
  }
}
}
section.content.init(java.getElement("@@id.content@children!0").toArray());
section.content.childNode.join("")
</js>

ruleContent.content:
<js>

//第一种方法
url="http:"+result.match(/<script>initTxt\(\"([^\s]+)\",/)[1];
result = java.ajax(url);
con=result.match(/"content":"([\S\s]+)","replace"/)[1];
rep =result.match(/"replace":\{([\S\s]+)\}\}\)/)[1];
con_=String(JSON.stringify(con));
Aaa=rep.replace(/"/g,"");
rep_=String(JSON.stringify(Aaa)).replace(/"/g,"");
BBB=rep_.split(",");

for(let i=0;i<BBB.length;i++)
{
	CCC=BBB[i].split(":");
	while(con_.indexOf(CCC[1])!=-1){
	con_=con_.replace(CCC[1],CCC[0]);
		}
}
result=con_.replace(/\\\\n/g,"\<br\>");


/*	
//第二种方法
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)/)[1];
var json=java.ajax(url);
//java.log(json);
if (json != null) {
            json = eval("(" + String(json).replace("_txt_call(", "").replace(/[;\)]+$/, "") + ")");
            //java.log(JSON.stringify(json));
            for (let key in json.replace) {
                let i = new RegExp(json.replace[key], "ig");
                json.content = json.content.replace(i, key)
            }
            result = json.content;
        }
*/

</js>
html

ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
if(/"\/get-page-next\?"/.test(String(result))){
url = "https://www.damixs.co/get-page-next?"+Math.random();

post = result.match(/data: {'v1':'([^']+)','v2':'([^']+)','v3':'([^']+)','v4':'([^']+)'},/);

body ="v1="+java.encodeURI(post[1])+"&v2="+java.encodeURI(post[2])+"&v3="+java.encodeURI(post[3])+"&v4="+java.encodeURI(post[4]);

option = {
	"method":"POST",
	"body":body
	}
	j = java.ajax(url+","+JSON.stringify(option))

JSON.parse(j).url.replace(/\s+/g,'+')
}
</js>

需登录

◎搜索格式◎
1、搜索用户<关闭精确搜索>
@用户名

2、搜索合集<关闭精确搜索>
#合集

3、搜索文章，直接搜索

发现规则
                                    🏷标签
标签名::https://api.lofter.com/oldapi/tagPosts.api?product=lofter-android-6.13.0&method=newTagSearch&offset={{(page-1) *22}}&limit=22&firstpermalink=null&tag=标签名&type=new,{"method": "POST","body":"null"}

📃用户（搜索可以得到)

出现目录加载失败，请尝试刷新，因为可能是请求失败导致的

ruleBookInfo.author: $.response.blogInfo.blogNickName||$.response.posts[0].post.blogInfo.blogNickName
ruleBookInfo.init:
<js>
try{
cookie = cookie.getCookie("https://newsmiss.lofter.com");

lofter = String(cookie).match(/;\s(LOFTER-[^-]+-LOGIN-AUTH)=(.*?);/);

header = {};
header[lofter[1]] = lofter[2];
source.putLoginHeader(JSON.stringify(header))
result;
}catch(e){
	result = result
	}
</js>
ruleBookInfo.name: $.response.collection.name

ruleContent.content: content = java.getString("$..content"); imgs = eval(String(java.getString("$..photoLinks"))); video = "" if(/\.mp4/.test(baseUrl)){ video = "请点击章节链接观看视频\n视频链接："+baseUrl } img = ""; imgs?imgs.forEach(x=>{ x?img += "\n":"" }):"" result = content + "\n"+img + video;
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
try{
		id = java.getString("$..post.id");
		id2 = java.getString("$..post.blogId");
url ="https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/post/newSupportInfo?postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2+"&openFansVipPlan=0&vipFans=0"
	$  = JSON.parse(String(java.ajax(url)));
	l = $.data.gainReturnGifts;
	ls = []
	l.forEach(x=>{
		url = "https://api.lofter.com/v1.1/trade/gift/myReturnGift?id="+x.id+"&postId="+id+"&blogId="+id2;
		ls.push(url)
		})
	result = ls
	}catch(e){
		}
</js>

ruleToc.nextTocUrl:
<js>
pages=java.get('page');
page=parseInt(pages/500);
url=String(java.get('url'));
list=[];

if(page>6){
page=6
}else{page=page}

for(i=1;i<=page;i++){
list.push(url.replace(/offset=\d+/,'offset='+(parseInt(i)*500)))
}

list
</js>

<js>result.replace(/(.*)\n/,'$1 ⌚️')</js>
<js>result.replace(/^(正文|VIP章节|最新章节)?(\s+|_)|[\(\{（｛【].*[求更谢乐发推票盟补加字Kk\/].*[\)\}）｝】]/g,'')</js>
<js>
result.replace(/^(\d+)、第.+章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+、/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)、\d+/,'第$1章')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?\d+\s/,'$1 ')
.replace(/^(\d+)(、|. ?)/,'第$1章 ')
.replace(/^(第.+章)\s?第.+章/,'$1')
.replace(/第\s(.+)\s章/,'第$1章')
.replace(/.*(chapter|Chapter)\s?(\d+)\s?/,'$1 $2 ')
.replace(/(章)([^\s]+)(\s·)*/,'$1 $2$3')
.replace(/第([零一二三四五六七八九十百千]+)章/g,java.toNumChapter(result))
.replace(/第0+/,'第')
</js>

<js>
gender=baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/gender=(\d+)/)[1]:""
category_id=baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/category_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_filters=baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_filters=(\d+)/)[1]:""
page=baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/page=(\d+)/)[1]:""
need_category=baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/need_category=(\d+)/)[1]:""
tag_id=baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)?baseUrl.match(/tag_id=(\d+)/)[1]:""
sign_key='d3dGiJc651gSQ8w1'
headers={'app-version':'51110','platform':'android','reg':'0','AUTHORIZATION':'','application-id':'com.****.reader','net-env':'1','channel':'unknown','qm-params':''}
headers['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(headers).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+headers[n],'')+sign_key))


var urlEncode = function (param, key, encode) {
  if(param==null) return '';
  var paramStr = '';
  var t = typeof (param);
  if (t == 'string' || t == 'number' || t == 'boolean') {
    paramStr += '&' + key + '=' + ((encode==null||encode) ? encodeURIComponent(param) : param);
  } else {
    for (var i in param) {
      var k = key == null ? i : key + (param instanceof Array ? '[' + i + ']' : '.' + i);
      paramStr += urlEncode(param[i], k, encode);
    }
  }
  return paramStr;
};

var category = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'category_id':category_id,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'need_category':need_category}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/category/get-list?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};

var tag = function () {
  params={'gender':gender,'need_filters':need_filters,'page':page,'tag_id':tag_id}
  params['sign']=String(java.md5Encode(Object.keys(params).sort().reduce((pre,n)=>pre+n+'='+params[n],'')+sign_key))
  url="https://api-bc.wtzw.com/api/v4/tag/index?"+urlEncode(params)
  return java.ajax(url+','+java.put("headers",JSON.stringify({"headers":headers})))
};


if(baseUrl.match(/category/)){
  category()
}else {
  tag()
}
</js>

<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';

href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

ruleBookInfo.intro:
<js>
list=java.getElements("@@class.BGsectionThree-content@li").toArray();
intro=java.getElements('#intro').html();
href='';text='';
for(i in list){
href=href+list[i].select('a:eq(1)').attr('href')+'\n';
text=text+'【'+i+'】'+list[i].html()+'\n';
}
java.put('list',href);
xu=(book.getVariable("custom")==null||book.getVariable("custom")=="")?"0":book.getVariable("custom");
laiyuan='当前来源【'+xu+'】';
result='（下面 [换源列表] 若有多个项时，点详情页右上角 -> [设置书籍变量]，输入序号，[确定] 后再点 [刷新]，可更改对应的源，默认为0）【换源列表】：\n'+text+'\n'+laiyuan+'\n————————————\n'+intro
</js>

doc=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(result); chapter=doc.select(".chapter")?doc.select(".chapter"):''; chapter?chapter.remove():''; content = { star: 0, childNode: [], childNodes: doc.select("#content>div").toArray(), load: function() { var a = String(java.base64Decode(java.getString('//*[@name="client"]/@content'))).split(/[A-Z]+%/); var j = 0; for (var i = 0; i < a.length; i++) { if (a[i] < 3) { this.childNode[a[i]] = this.childNodes[i + this.star]; j++ } else { this.childNode[a[i] - j] = this.childNodes[i + this.star]; j=j+2 } }; } } content.load(); result=chapter+content.childNode.join("
"); String(result).replace(/([^<]+)<\/h3>/g,'◎ $1\n'); ####【注：$1】

ruleContent.content:
<js>
url="https:"+result.match(/initTxt\("([^"]+)","[^"]+"\)/)[1];
r=String(java.ajax(url).match(/_txt_call\(([\s\S]+\})\)/)[1]);
var r = eval('(' + r + ')');
				if(r.content!=null){				
      var e = r.replace;
				for (var n in e) {
					var i = new RegExp(e[n], "ig");
					r.content = r.content.replace(i, n)
				}
				result=r.content
					}else{result="章节加载失败，或者容正在手打中，请【收藏本站】稍访问或者联系管理员更新~"}
</js>

bookSourceComment:
◎只看楼主：
在设置源变量（该源所有书应用）或者设置书籍变量（只有本书应用）里填上『只看楼主』则只会显示楼主内容，有些页数内容为空很正常。
做完更改后都需要刷新，正文如果缓存了也需要刷新，或者清楚缓存
◎发现规则url
贴吧名::https://tieba.baidu.com/mo/q/m?word=贴吧名（不要写吧字）&page_from_search=index&tn6=bdISP&tn4=bdKSW&tn7=bdPSB&lm=16842752&lp=6093&sub4=%E8%BF%9B%E5%90%A7&pn={{(page-1)*30}}
◎可能访问频繁导致加载失败，点登录完成验证点✓，或者在无验证时直接点登录点✓，或者换个网络，再返回书籍刷新

搜索格式如下
①综合：直接搜索
以下需关闭精确搜索
②用户：@用户名@
③超话：%超话名%
④话题：#话题名#
按以下格式填写可查看评论（不登录只有20条，条数太多会请求频繁【可以选择清除cookie回到未登录状态】）
是/否开启评论：是20条

" } count += 1 comments +="\n--@"+list[i].user.screen_name+"@--\n"+list[i].text+details; }} } result + comments }

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
d=/"text": "(.*)",/.test(result)?String(result).match(/ "text": "(.*)",/)[1]:"暂无目录";
b=d.replace(/<.*?>/g,"").replace(/#.*?#/g,"");
c=baseUrl;
l=[];

if(/网页链接/.test(d) || /timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
	if(/timeline_card_small_article_default/.test(d)){
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
	l.push({
		href:result.match(/"page_url": "([^"]+)",/)[1]+",{'webView':true}",
		text:result.match(/"content1": "([^"]+)",/)[1],
		info:result.match(/ "content2": "([^"]+)",/)[1]
		})
}

if(/网页链接/.test(d)){
	list = d.match(/<br \/>[^<]+<a  href=\\"[^"]+\\" data-hid/g);
	l.push({
		text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",
		href:c
		})
	for(i in list){
	l.push({
		text : list[i].match(/>([^<]+)<a/)[1],
		href:list[i].match(/href=\\"([^"]+)\\"/)[1]
		})
	  }
	}
	}else{
		l=[{text:b.substring(0,10)+"......",href:c}]
		}
		l
</js>

bookSourceComment:
by.关耳
关键词，搜书名；
@关键词，搜作者。
#关键词，搜作者。
迷迭轻改  交流群637775313
■由于优书网部分书评 需账号登录才能浏览。。
API版的书源需要抓包获取token值才能在书源登录，不方便普通用户使用。www版我又不会搞gzip，最后只整出个杂交版本（反正能登录了）。
■【书源登录方法】编辑书源，右上角，弹出菜单，第一项-登录。弹出新页面登录你的账号。（方法2：随意打开一本书籍，在正文页面点登录也行，登录后退回正文，刷新正文即可浏览所有书评）
■只需登录一次，会记录状态。（貌似）
🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸🔸
❤️❤️优书网书源的2个用法：
1、直接在发现列表查看榜单，查看书籍的书评（看完书评退回书籍简介页面，换源，看书）
2、搜书界面，选择 “▪︎优书 看书评 换源看书” 分组，
直接搜索书名，可搜到该书籍；
@作者名，可搜索出该作者的书籍；
#作者名，可搜索出该作者的书籍。

ruleContent.content: function parseComments(n){ for(var c=[],e=0;e': parseComments(data.data.comments);

ruleSearch.author: author##<[^<>]+>
ruleSearch.name: title

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
var data = JSON.parse(result).data;
var pageSize = data.comments.length;
var pageCount = Math.ceil(data.total/pageSize) || 1; // NaN
var list = Array.from(Array(pageCount).keys());
for(var i = 0; i <(pageCount>2 ? 2 : pageCount); i++){
  var index = list[i]+1;
  list[i] = {title:'第00' + index +'页', url: baseUrl.split('?')[0] + '?type=&page=' + index + '&t='+Date.now()};
}
list;
</js>

bookSourceComment:
在设置书籍变量处填
以下格式：
开始页-结束页
如
10-20
则评论从第10页开始，第20页结束
默认最多从第1页至第10页结束
（更改完书籍变量一定要刷新正文）

ruleContent.content: @css:.tab,.pagebar:nth-child(1),[id^="comment_"]@html if(baseUrl.match(/page=\d+/)){ result=result }else{ result="" } result .replace(/发表时间：/g,'\n⌚️') .replace(/(№\d+)/g,'———————\n‎\n$1') .replace(/.*?numstr">([^<]+)<\/span>/g,'👍$1') .replace(/.*?numstr">([^<]+)<\/span>/g,'👎$1') .replace(/共有/g,'✏️共有') .replace(/章评<\/span>|/g,'')
ruleContent.nextContentUrl:
<js>
if(baseUrl.match(/page=2/)){
result=""
}else{
allpage=result.match(/'redtext'>([^<]+)<\/span>页/)[1];
list=[];

len=allpage>10?10:allpage;

start=1;end=len;
if(book.getVariable("custom")!=""){
start=Number(book.getVariable("custom").match(/(\d+)-\d+/)[1]);
end=Number(book.getVariable("custom").match(/\d+-(\d+)/)[1]);
}
for(i=start;i<=end;i++){
list.push(baseUrl+"&page="+i);
}
list
}
</js>
